actionable_tasks.title: Complete MongoDB TTL Indexes
actionable_tasks.description: Finish implementing MongoDB TTL indexes at 50% progress, targeting documents like logs or sessions that expire after a set time (e.g., 7 days for analytics data).
implementation_steps: Review current 50% implementation in MongoDB schema definitions.
Add TTL indexes to relevant collections: db.collection.createIndex({ "createdAt": 1 }, { expireAfterSeconds: 604800 }).
Test index creation and document auto-expiration with sample inserts.
Update package.json scripts to include TTL verification in quality:check.

actionable_tasks.title: Expand Performance Monitoring to p50/p95 Tracking
actionable_tasks.description: Advance performance monitoring from 40% by adding p50/p95 latency metrics collection using existing tools, targeting API response times.
implementation_steps: Integrate percentile calculations (p50, p95) into current metrics collector using libraries like prom-client or simple array sorting.
Hook into API routes to log response times and compute percentiles over rolling windows.
Expose metrics endpoint (e.g., /api/metrics) and add to dashboard.
Run load tests to validate against target <200ms p95.

actionable_tasks.title: Implement Basic Testing Expansion for 70% Coverage
actionable_tasks.description: Increase test coverage from ~45% to >70% by adding Jest tests for MCP endpoints and provider health checks, focusing on untested routes.
implementation_steps: Run coverage report: npm test -- --coverage to identify gaps in MCP and provider modules.
Write 10-15 unit tests for key functions (e.g., failover logic, health checks).
Add integration tests for endpoints like /api/providers/health.
Update CI scripts to enforce >70% threshold.

actionable_tasks.title: Add AI Transparency Metadata Tagging
actionable_tasks.description: Start AI Transparency by adding metadata tags for AI-generated recommendations in responses, complying with upcoming mandates.
implementation_steps: Inject 'ai-generated: true' and 'model: gemini/claude/etc' fields into recommendation payloads.
Update response serializer to include these tags.
Test with sample queries and verify in MongoDB logs.

actionable_tasks.title: Create Simple Dockerfiles and docker-compose for Dev
actionable_tasks.description: Containerize Node backend, React frontend, and MCP servers with basic Dockerfiles and dev compose file.
implementation_steps: Write multi-stage Dockerfile for backend (Node) with production deps.
Create frontend Dockerfile using Node for build and nginx serve.
Add docker-compose.yml for local dev stack (services: backend, frontend, mongo).
Test with docker-compose up and document in README.
